Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 57th/Museum
ShortDescription: WB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Everett, 56th, Everett and 55th due to, street blockage near 57th/Museum.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Everett, 56th, Everett and 55th due to, street blockage near 57th/Museum.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier injured customer at Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier injured customer at Lake

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
